analysis.description:
EtherealTipJar.TransferERC20 (/unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol#187-192) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(to,value) (/unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_buyer' of EtherealToken.BuyToken (/unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EtherealToken.BuyToken (/unique_chucks/42/0xab0b54efe35457d92cfcddcf4d2cd6f0cb788036.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
